nodes.text: Phoenix Leader was the callsign attributed to the lead pilot of Phoenix Squadron. During the Imperial blockade of Ibaar, a human male served as Phoenix Leader until his death during the mission. After the mission's success, the Twi'lek female Captain Hera Syndulla was promoted to Phoenix Leader by Commander Jun Sato on the recommendation of Kanan Jarrus. Although Phoenix Squadron ceased to exist as a unit due to casualties inflicted during the Battle of Atollon, Syndulla continued to hold the title within the Rebel Alliance as late as the year 1 BBY.
